snippet: “Everybody Rise: A Celebration of Elaine Stritch” brought out the bright lights of New York Monday night in tribute to the longtime star who died in July.
abstract: Theater community gathers to applaud the career of performer Elaine Stritch, who died in July, at Everybody Rise: A Celebration of Elaine Stritch at the Al Hirschfeld Theater; live tribute, created by artistic director George C Wolfe, is as much entertainment as it is a memorial.
lead_paragraph: “Everybody Rise: A Celebration of Elaine Stritch” brought out the bright lights of New York Monday night in tribute to the longtime star who died in July.

headline.main: Farewell to Elaine Stritch, the Lady Who Lunched Like No Other
headline.print_headline: Farewell to the Lady Who Lunched Like No Other
